title: Get Gortash's Netherstone
content:
Get Gortash's Netherstone Type Quest Act Act 3 Location Wyrm's Rock Reward

Get Gortash's Netherstone

Get Gortash's Netherstone is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Get Gortash's Netherstone can be acquired during Act 3 as part of Confront the Elder Brain. Complete this Quest to obtain one of the Three Netherstones that you need to collect. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Get Gortash's Netherstone Objectives

Head west on the road to Baldur's Gate

Gortash left for Baldur's Gate. We should go after him.

Baldur's Gate is near. We should find out where Gortash is

Find Gortash in Wyrm's Rock Fortress.

We discovered that Gortash is in Wyrm's Rock Fortress, where he will be sworn in as an Archduke of Baldur's Gate. We need to make our way there.

Enter the Audience Hall.

We made it to Wyrm's Rock Fortress and were invited to Gortash's inauguration upstairs.

Confront Gortash.

Gortash is protected by the Steel Watch. if we want to make a move against him, we should figure out how to deal with them first.

Consider Gortash's bargain

Gortash put forward a proposition. if we kill Orin and take her Netherstone, he will let us rule the city alongside him with the elder brain at our command.

How to unlock Get Gortash's Netherstone

Automatically gained at the start of Act 3.

Get Gortash's Netherstone Rewards

Get Gortash's Netherstone Walkthrough

If you visit the Sword Coast Couriers in Rivington, you'll find a poster you can look at freely on the desk - the Gortash Coronation Poster. If you read it, you'll learn that Gortash is being named an Archduke and that the ceremony will take place at Wyrm's Rock. Get Gortash's Netherstone and Our Fiery Friend will be updated with this information.

After you disabled the steel watches, you can venture to Wyrm's Rock upper level to fight Gortash. After you defeated him, loot his body for the gauntlets to get the Netherstone.

Get Gortash's Netherstone Notes & Tips

Gortash has a +0 to Constitution saving throws. Despite him having advantage on spell saving throws, Flesh to Stone is an excellent spell to use on him, especially when paired with a Hex (CON).
